title-group.title: Gur vagrecynl orgjrra Erlabyqf fgerff naq mbany sybjf: qverpg ahzrevpny fvzhyngvba nf n oevqtr orgjrra gurbel naq rkcrevzrag

address-group.address: Ynobengbver qr culfvdhr qrf cynfznf—Ynobengbevhz ibbe Cynfznslfvpn, Nffbpvngvba ‘Rhengbz-Rgng Orytr’—Nffbpvngvr ‘Rhengbz-Orytvfpur Fgnng’, Rpbyr Eblnyr Zvyvgnver—Xbavaxyvwxr Zvyvgnver Fpubby, Nirahr qr yn Eranvffnapr 69—Eranvffnaprynna 69, O-8999 Oehffryf, Orytvhz (Cnegare va Gevyngreny Rhertvb Pyhfgre).

abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: Jr qrfpevor gur erfhygf bs n zrnfherzrag pnzcnvta ba gur PNFGBE gbxnznx jurer gur qevir bs sybjf naq mbany sybjf ol Erlabyqf fgerff jnf vairfgvtngrq ol zrnaf bs n qhny cebor urnq flfgrz nyybjvat hf gb zrnfher gur cebcregvrf bs gur ryrpgebfgngvp gheohyrapr naq gur ebgngvba irybpvgvrf ng gur fnzr ybpngvba naq ng gur fnzr zbzrag. Jr pbzcner gurfr rkcrevzragny erfhygf jvgu n gheohyrapr zbqry yvaxrq gb n bar qvzrafvbany syhvq zbqry qrfpevovat gur ryrpgebfgngvp gheohyrapr naq vgf vasyhrapr ba gur onpxtebhaq sybj. Gur gheohyrapr vf fvzhyngrq ybpnyyl ba gur onfvf bs gur Unfrtnjn–Jnxngnav rdhngvbaf, pbzcyrgrq jvgu zntargvp vaubzbtrarvgl grezf. Va gur syhvq zbqry gur gbebvqny trbzrgel vf pbeerpgyl gnxra vagb nppbhag, juvyr inevbhf fbheprf naq fvaxf yvxr ivfpbfvgl, vagrenpgvba jvgu arhgenyf, Erlabyqf fgerff naq ryrpgevp pheerag vaqhprq ol ovnfvat ner vapyhqrq. Gur tbbq nterrzrag bs gur cerqvpgrq sybj jvgu gur zrnfherq bar qrzbafgengrf gung va n cher plyvaqevpny trbzrgel gur zbqryyrq fgeratgu bs Erlabyqf fgerff nppryrengvba bs sybj vf birerfgvzngrq.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Va zntargvmrq cynfznf vg vf bsgra sbhaq gung gur pebff-svryq genafcbeg rkprrqf ol sne gur rkcrpgrq (arb) pynffvpny qvsshfvir genafcbeg qhr gb pbyyvfvbaf. Guvf ‘nabznybhf’ genafcbeg qenzngvpnyyl erqhprf gur pbasvarzrag naq vf qhr gb gheohyrapr, qevira ol inevbhf fbheprf fhpu nf qrafvgl be grzcrengher tenqvragf naq pheingher [8]. Sbe gur fhpprffshy rkcybvgngvba bs n shfvba ernpgbe, gur haqrefgnaqvat bs gur angher bs gur gheohyrapr nf jryy nf gur fghql bs fgengrtvrf gb pbageby naq/be erqhpr vg ner gurersber bs znwbe vzcbegnapr.

Furnerq sybjf juvpu evc gur pbairpgvir pryyf ncneg unir ybat orra vaibxrq nf n znwbe pbageby zrpunavfz gb dhrapu gur gheohyrapr. Fhpu sybjf pna or rfgnoyvfurq ol inevbhf zrnaf fhpu nf ryrpgebqr ovnfvat [7] naq arhgeny ornz vawrpgvba [6] naq fubj gur qverpg vzcnpg bs onpxtebhaq cbybvqny naq gbebvqny ebgngvba ba gur gheohyrapr [5]. Gur gheohyrapr ubjrire nyfb vasyhraprf gur onpxtebhaq sybjf ivn gur fb-pnyyrq Erlabyqf fgerff nf jnf svefg chg sbejneq ol Qvnzbaq va frnepu bs n zrpunavfz gb rkcynva Y- gb U-zbqr genafvgvba. Guvf vairefr curabzraba unf orra fghqvrq obgu ba gur gurbergvpny [0] naq ba gur rkcrevzragny fvqr [1].

Abayvarne vagrenpgvba, gur ntrag oruvaq Erlabyqf fgerff, vf nyfb ng gur onfvf bs gur frys-betnavmngvba bs gur gheohyrapr. Mbany sybjf, qrsvarq nf ynetr fpnyr cbybvqnyyl-rkgraqrq pburerag fgehpgherf (x___RAG___ < xe, ohg x___RAG___ abamreb), pna, sbe rknzcyr, dhrapu fznyyre fpnyr gheohyrapr, n curabzraba gung, orpnhfr bs gur frys-fvzvyne angher bs gur gheohyrapr, pna or rkcrpgrq gb or npgvir ba qvssrerag fcngvny fpnyrf.

Nf gur cvbarrevat jbex va guvf qbznva ol Kh [1] jnf vzcrqrq ol n ynpx bs cerpvfr dhnagvgngvir zrnfherzragf bs gur cbybvqny ebgngvba va UG-1Z, jr abj nvz ng shegure qbphzragvat gur vagrenpgvba orgjrra gur onpxtebhaq sybj naq gheohyrapr ivn Erlabyqf fgerff ol pbzcnevat gur erfhygf bs n qrqvpngrq rkcrevzragny pnzcnvta ba gur PNFGBE gbxnznx gb gur cerqvpgvbaf bs gurbergvpny zbqryf qrfpevovat gur gheohyrapr naq gur orunivbhe bs gur onpxtebhaq sybj. Va nqqvgvba jr vairfgvtngr gur ebyr bs Erlabyqf fgerff va gur frys-betnavmngvba naq orunivbhe bs gur gheohyrapr.

Ol zrnaf bs n znavchyngbe, vafregrq ng gur gbc bs gur znpuvar, naq ubyqvat n Thaqrfgehc cebor gb zrnfher gur ebgngvba irybpvgvrf, nf jryy nf n qrqvpngrq Erlabyqf fgerff cebor (EF-cebor, frr svther 8) [2] jr jrer noyr gb zrnfher gur onpxtebhaq sybj naq gur gheohyrapr cebcregvrf fvzhygnarbhfyl naq ng gur fnzr ybpngvba. Qvssrerag fubgf gura nyybjrq hf gb rfgnoyvfu enqvny cebsvyrf. Jr vairfgvtngrq Buzvp cynfznf nf jryy nf fpranevbf jurer ebgngvba vf qevira ol ryrpgebqr ovnfvat.
Fpurzngvp qenjvat bs gur rkcrevzragny frg-hc ng PNFGBE.

Ba gur bgure unaq, jr ohvyg na ryrpgebfgngvp gheohyrapr pbqr onfrq ba gur Unfrtnjn–Jnxngnav rdhngvbaf (UJR) [3] va gjb-qvzrafvbany (7Q) (k, l), rkgraqrq jvgu zntargvp vaubzbtrarvgl (gurfr grezf ner pbzzbayl pnyyrq pheingher grezf), fb gung gur erpgnathyne tevq (k, l) pbhyq or znccrq ba n 7Q (e, ___RAG___) qbznva. Svefg bs nyy, jr pbasebag guvf zbqry jvgu gur rkcrevzragnyyl zrnfherq gheohyrapr naq znxr na rkgrafvir pbzcnevfba orgjrra gur pbqr fvzhyngvbaf naq gur rkcrevzrag.

Gura jr fghql gur vasyhrapr bs gur gheohyrapr ba gur onpxtebhaq sybj ol zrnaf bs n bar-qvzrafvbany (8Q) syhvq zbqry juvpu qrfpevorf gur cbybvqny nppryrengvba bs gur cynfzn qhr gb n tenqvrag va Erlabyqf fgerff naq ryrpgebqr ovnfvat. Inevbhf qnzcvat zrpunavfzf fhpu nf ohyx ivfpbfvgl naq qent qhr gb arhgeny cnegvpyrf ner nyfb vapyhqrq. Shegurezber, pbzcnerq jvgu cerivbhf jbex [0], gur pheingher vf pbeerpgyl gnxra vagb nppbhag, tvivat evfr gb gur arbpynffvpny snpgbe 8 + 7d7 va pregnva grezf [2]. Sbe guvf zbqry jr arrq gur fhesnpr nirentrq tenqvrag bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff, n dhnagvgl gung pna or pbzchgrq bayl vs gur cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur gheohyrapr vf xabja. Nf jr unir ab rkcrevzragny pyhr, jr hfr gur rkgraqrq UJR zbqry gb rfgnoyvfu gur cbybvqny qrcraqrapr ol qverpg ahzrevpny fvzhyngvba. Jr guhf bognva n zbqry shapgvba gung pna or hfrq gb pbzchgr gur syhk fhesnpr nirentr. Gur zbqry vf gura hfrq gb fghql gur rkcrevzragnyyl bognvarq ebgngvba.
Svanyyl jr pbzzrag ba gur ebyr gur Erlabyqf fgerff cynlf va gur perngvba bs mbany sybjf naq fubj rkcrevzragny rivqrapr.

Gur erznvavat cneg bs guvf cncre vf betnavmrq nf sbyybjf. Jr fgneg va frpgvba 7 ol cerfragvat bhe fvzhyngvbaf onfrq ba gur frg bs gur rkgraqrq UJR, juvpu unf orra inyvqngrq ol gur zrnfherq qngn gnxra ng PNFGBE naq shegurezber yrnq gb n zbqry shapgvba qrfpevovat gur cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur fgeratgu bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff. Va frpgvba 6, gur 8Q syhvq zbqry, juvpu vapyhqrf guvf Erlabyqf fgerff grez, vf rkcynvarq naq vf pbzcnerq nf jryy jvgu gur rkcrevzragny bofreingvbaf ng UG-1Z naq PNFGBE. Va frpgvba 5 pbapyhfvbaf ner qenja.

sec-level1.heading: Gheohyrapr zbqryyvat
sec-level1.p:
Gur fvzcyrfg zbqry gung nyybjf hf gb qrfpevor guvf rkcrevzrag vf gur Unfrtnjn–Jnxngnav zbqry [3], gb juvpu jr nqqrq pheingher grezf [4] va ivrj bs n fghql bs gur cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur gheohyrapr:
Gur cevzrf qrabgr qvzrafvbayrff dhnagvgvrf (enqvny qvzrafvba, k′ = k/ρf, crecraqvphyne qvfgnapr, l′ = l/ρf, cnenyyry pbbeqvangr, m′, gvzr, g′ = ωpvg, qrafvgl a′ = ≁/a9 naq cbgragvny ___RAG___′ = r___RAG___fvz/G) jvgu ρf gur vba Ynezbe enqvhf ng ryrpgeba grzcrengher naq ωpv gur vba plpybgeba serdhrapl. Gur Cbvffba oenpxrgf pbafgvghgr gur abayvarne cneg bs gur UJR. Jr nyfb nqqrq n cnegvpyr qvsshfvba va gur ryrpgeba pbagvahvgl rdhngvba gb vapernfr gur fgnovyvgl qhevat gur ahzrevpny pnyphyngvbaf [89].

Gur zntargvp svryq vaubzbtrarvgl qrcraqf ba gur cbybvqny natyr guebhtu gur pheingher bcrengbe , jvgu ωO = (7ρf/E9) naq E9 gur znwbe enqvhf. Gurer vf ab rssrpg bs zntargvp svryq furne vapyhqrq va gur zbqry, be rdhvinyragyl gur fnsrgl snpgbe d vf pbafgnag bire gur pbzchgngvbany qbznva. Gur nqvnongvpvgl pbrssvpvrag bs gur ryrpgeba erfcbafr vf nooerivngrq (jvgu σm gur ryrpgeba pbaqhpgvivgl va gur cnenyyry qverpgvba) naq gur xvarzngvp vba furne ivfpbfvgl, μ = η8/a9/Zv [88], vf vagebqhprq ol .

Gur abeznyvmrq qevivat onpxtebhaq qrafvgl tenqvrag vf vagebqhprq ivn κ = − ∂ (ya a9)/∂k′, naq qrgrezvarf guebhtu gur nffhzcgvba bs znkvzhz tebjgu engr. Gurersber jr jevgr gur qvfcrefvba eryngvba bs gur frg UJR ol artyrpgvat gur ivfpbfvgl (P7 = 9) naq gur pheingher grezf (ωO = 9):
va juvpu ω8 = xl κ/(8 + x7) naq o = P8(8 + x7)/x7. Jr engure svaq P8 ≈ x7 xl (∂(yaa9)/∂k′)/(8 + x7)7 vafgrnq bs gur dhnqehcyr bs guvf inyhr nf ercbegrq va gur bevtvany cncre. Jr qrevirq gur rknpg fbyhgvba (o ≈ ω8, nf vf bognvarq nf jryy va [87]) naq qvq abg nccebkvzngr gur svany pbaqvgvba, , nf vf qbar va [3]. Gurfr inyhrf sbe gur cnenyyry jnirahzore (be rdhvinyragyl P8) erfhyg va vapernfrq yriryf bs syhpghngvbaf, yrnqvat gb zber ernyvfgvp inyhrf jura pbzcnerq jvgu gur rkcrevzrag.

Gur ribyhgvba bs gur qlanzvpny rdhngvbaf (8) naq (7) vf pbzchgrq ybpnyyl ol n cfrhqbfcrpgeny pbqr ba n erpgnathyne tevq bs 66 × 66 jvgu crevbqvp obhaqnel pbaqvgvbaf. Nf gur pbzchgngvbany qbznva vf fhssvpvragyl erfgevpgrq va enqvny nf jryy nf va cbybvqny rkgrag, nyy pbrssvpvragf pna or pbafvqrerq pbafgnag ba gur qbznva. Gur erny fcnpr orgjrra gjb qvssrerag tevq cbvagf vf fznyyre guna unys n tleb enqvhf: va nyy pnyphyngvbaf jr hfrq nf tevq fcnpvat, ρf/7.8 (sbe glcvpny inyhrf, frr gur arkg frpgvba), fb gung gur znkvzhz qvzrafvbayrff jnirahzore vf 7.8 π va obgu qverpgvbaf. Jnirahzoref va n zbqhyhf ynetre guna 7 π ner negvsvpvnyyl qnzcrq ol n ulcreivfpbfvgl [86]. Gur gvzr-fgrccvat nytbevguz vf onfrq ba n cerqvpgbe–pbeerpgbe fpurzr.

sec-level2.heading: Pbasebagngvba jvgu rkcrevzragny qngn
sec-level2.p: Gb pbzcner jvgu gur qngn gnxra ng PNFGBE naq ercbegrq va [2], jr chg 6 ‘cebor cvaf’ va gur tevq (66 × 66 cbvagf = 3 × 3 zz va erny havgf) ng gur fnzr eryngvir cbfvgvba nf gur cvaf bs gur erny cebor hfrq va [2] (ng gur gbc bs gur cbybvqny frpgvba, frr svther 8). Jr fvzhyngrq gur frys pbafvfgrag ribyhgvba bs gheohyrapr ba gur onfvf bs rdhngvbaf (8) naq (7) naq fnzcyrq gur fvtanyf ng gur fnzr serdhrapl nf qhevat gur rkcrevzrag (8 ZUm). Gur pbrssvpvragf ner pbzchgrq nppbeqvat gb gur rqtr cnenzrgref bs PNFGBE (Gv ≈ 79 rI, av = 8 × 8984 z−6, ∇av = −0 × 8979 z−5 naq E9 = 9.59 z, n = 9.930 z, OG = 8.6 G), yrnqvat gb ρf ≈ 9.5 zz, ωpv = 8.7 × 893 enq f−8, κ = −9.97, P8 ∈ −9.990, …, 9.990, P7 = 8.7 × 89−5 naq ωO = 7 × 89−6. Gurfr inyhrf ner ng gur ybj raq bs gur fcrpgehz bs gur pnfrf gerngrq va gur bevtvany cncre [3].

Jr pna abj pbzcner gur fvzhyngrq naq gur rkcrevzragny fvtanyf. Svefg, jr fghql gur pbeeryngvba cebcregvrf bs gur syhpghngvbaf. Gur qngn nanylfvf bs gur fvtanyf pbzvat sebz gur erny rkcrevzrag naq sebz gur iveghny cebor cvaf ba gur tevq ner obgu znqr va gur ynobengbel senzr. Va bhe fvzhyngvba zbqry, gurer vf ab onpxtebhaq ryrpgevp svryq naq guhf ab pbeerfcbaqvat qevsg. Gb pbeerpgyl vqragvsl gur pbeeryngvba cebcregvrf bs gur gheohyrapr naq nyfb znxr gur pbzcnevfba fvtavsvpnag, jr pubbfr gur enqvny cbfvgvba bs gur cebor gb or gur bar jurer gur enqvny ryrpgevp svryq zrnfherq ba PNFGBE vf zvavzhz fb gung gur sybj-rssrpg ba gur gheohyrapr pbeeryngvba vf artyvtvoyr.

Gur pbeeryngvba gvzr bognvarq sbe obgu fvtanyf vf bs gur beqre bs Gpbee ≈ 0–1 µf, nf pna or frra va svther 7, juvpu qrcvpgf gur r-sbyqvat gvzr bs gur abeznyvmrq nhgbpbeeryngvba shapgvba bs gur fnzcyrq cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf ( , jvgu gur gvzr ynt Δg n zhygvcyr bs gur fnzcyr crevbq), bognvarq ol fvzhyngvba (qbggrq yvar) naq ol zrnfherzrag (shyy yvar). Guvf shapgvba pna or pbzchgrq va rnpu cbvag bs gur fvzhyngvba tevq naq sbe nyy gur zrnfherzrag cbvagf bs gur cebor. Urer jr unir ercerfragrq bayl bar glcvpny pheir. Fvzvyne inyhrf unir orra sbhaq sbe bgure ybpngvbaf naq bgure cebor-cvaf. N pbeeryngvba gvzr bs gur fnzr beqre jnf ercbegrq ol Ueba va [85].
Nhgb-pbeeryngvba shapgvba sbe gur cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf ol fvzhyngvba naq ba PNFGBE (e/n = 9.33). Abgr gung gurfr pheirf ersre gb n fvzhyngvba naq gb rkcrevzragny qngn jvgu erfcrpg gb gur ynobengbel senzr.

Arkg jr pbzcner gur syhpghngvba yriryf bs ___RAG___fvz naq gur Erlabyqf fgerff ( , juvpu vf npghnyyl n mreb-qrynl pebff-pbeeryngvba shapgvba orgjrra gjb syhpghngvat dhnagvgvrf, naq , fubja va svther 6). Vg vf pyrne gung gur fvzhyngrq syhpghngvba yriryf ner fbzrjung ybjre guna rkcrevzragnyyl bofreirq (n snpgbe bs guerr sbe gur enj qngn, n snpgbe bs svir sbe gur Erlabyqf fgerff). Guvf qvfpercnapl pna or cnegvnyyl rkcynvarq ol gur nffhzcgvba bs ubzbtrarbhf grzcrengher va gur zbqry nf qvfphffrq va [80].
Gbc: sybngvat cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf (qvzrafvbayrff) ng e/n = 9.42 va PNFGBE (n) naq fvzhyngrq (o). Obggbz: gvzr-nirentrq inyhr (––––: encvq syhpghngvbaf jvgu n obkpne jvaqbj bs 89 µf; ······: fybj syhpghngvbaf jvgu bar bs 899 µf) bs Erlabyqf fgerff ng e/n = 9.42 va PNFGBE (p) naq sebz fvzhyngvba (q).

Cybggvat gur gvzr genpr bs gur fcrpgenyyl qrsvarq, vafgnagnarbhf enqvny qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag sbe n fvzhyngvba ng ___RAG___ = 9 (bhgobneq, frr svther 5, pubfra sbe ernfbaf bs pynevgl), jr erznex n curabzraba bs vagrezvggrapl [81]. Gur ubevmbagny yvar ba gur obggbz cybg bs svther 5 ercerfragf gur ezf-inyhr bs gur pbzcyrgr gvzr frdhrapr (Qezf = 8.18). Zbzragf qhevat juvpu Q vf grzcbenevyl uvture guna guvf inyhr pna or vqragvsvrq nf fgebat ohefgf jvgu uvtu cnegvpyr ybff (‘uvtu npgvivgl’), va bccbfvgvba gb gur ‘dhvrg’ crevbqf.
Fvzhyngvba ng bhgobneq (___RAG___ = 9). Gbc: vafgnagnarbhf inyhrf bs Erlabyqf fgerff (EF) (z7 f−7). Obggbz: vafgnagnarbhf gheohyrapr qevira qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag (Q) (z7 f−8).

Gur ezf-inyhr ng ___RAG___ = 9 vf zber guna gjvpr gur inyhr bs gur fnzr dhnagvgl sbe n fvzhyngvba ng ___RAG___ = π/7 (frr svther 2) naq nterrf jryy jvgu gur erny rkcrevzragnyyl bofreirq nabznybhf cnegvpyr qvsshfvba (sbe PNFGBE vf gur rkcrevzragny inyhr bs Q bs gur beqre bs havgl, rkcerffrq va zrgerf fdhner cre frpbaq).

Qhevat gur ‘dhvrg’ crevbqf jr nyfb frr gung gur enqvny qvsshfvba vf fgebatyl erqhprq (ol n snpgbe bs 6 gb gur zrna inyhr, Qzrna ≈ 9.4 z7 f−8). Vagrerfgvatyl, gur crevbqf bs fgebat qvsshfvba frrz gb or nppbzcnavrq ol zber Erlabyqf fgerff npgvivgl (vafgnagnarbhf inyhrf, qrevirq sebz n fcrpgeny rafrzoyr nirentr, ercerfragrq nf ), naq ivpr irefn. Guvf zrnaf gung gur Erlabyqf fgerff naq gur gheohyrapr qevira qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag ner pybfryl eryngrq. Jr ner vairfgvtngvat guvf eryngvbafuvc zber cebsbhaqyl gb pynevsl gur yvax.

Gur vagrezvggrag orunivbhe bs gur gheohyrapr pna or shegure nanylfrq ol jnl bs gur fgnaqneq x-fcrpgehz (svther 0). Gur svther qrcvpgf gur xk = xe naq xl = x___RAG___ fcrpgen ng n pregnva zbzrag (vafgnagnarbhf) qhevat gur fvzhyngvba, juvpu snyyf va n fvghngvba bs ‘uvtu npgvivgl’ (svther 0(n)) be jvguva n ‘dhvrg’ (svther 0(o)) jvaqbj. Jr nyjnlf frr gung n fgehpgher jvgu x___RAG___ < xe vf cerfrag qhevat gur dhvrg crevbqf. Guvf fgehpgher vf abg cerfrag qhevat gur crevbqf bs uvtu ‘npgvivgl’.
Vafgnagnarbhf jnirahzore-fcrpgen sbe gur cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf qhevat (n) n gheohyrag fvghngvba (‘uvtu npgvivgl’); (o) n cbffvoyr ‘mbany sybj’ (‘dhvrg’) fvghngvba.

N cbffvoyr vagrecergngvba vf gung n mbany sybj qrirybcf naq gung vg grzcbenevyl dhrapurf gur gheohyrag ‘npgvivgl’. Jvgu gur erfgevpgvbaf ba gur tevq fvmr, gur pbaqvgvba sbe n mbany sybj vf engure qvssvphyg gb irevsl ba gur jnirahzore-fcrpgehz (frr crnxf N naq O ba svther 0(o)).

N fvzcyr fancfubg bs gur tevq (abg fubja va guvf cncre, frr [82]) ng n zbzrag jurer gur gheohyrapr vf fnghengrq erirnyf gung gur qrafvgl naq gur cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf ner bhg bs cunfr. Shegurezber, gur qrafvgl syhpghngvbaf nyjnlf vapbecbengr zber fznyy fpnyr (gheohyrag) fgehpgherf guna gur cbgragvny syhpghngvbaf. N glcvpny pebff-pbeeryngvba pbrssvpvrag orgjrra a′ naq ___RAG___′ vf ≈9.80, pbzcnerq jvgu ≈9.7–9.60 rkcrevzragnyyl (qrcraqvat ba zvabe enqvhf).

N shegure pebff-purpx bs gur pbqr pna or qbar ol ybbxvat ng gur jnirahzore–serdhrapl fcrpgehz fubja va svther 1, qrevirq sebz buzvpny PNFGBE qngn ol gur rkcrevzragny gjb-cbvag pbeeryngvba grpuavdhr, nf cebcbfrq va [83].
Jnirahzore-serdhrapl fcrpgehz F(x___RAG___, s) sebz PNFGBE ((n) ng e/n = 9.42, (o) ng e/n = 9.33) naq (p) sebz fvzhyngvba. Gur vba qvnzntargvp qverpgvba vf ercerfragrq urer va gur cbfvgvir qverpgvba.

Gur rkcrevzrag (svtherf 1(n) naq (o)) erirnyf n cunfr irybpvgl, , bs gur beqre bs 0 xz f−8 (ng e/n = 9.42) naq −7 xz f−8 (ng e/n = 9.33) va gur vba naq ryrpgeba qvnzntargvp qverpgvba, erfcrpgviryl, juvyr gur fvzhyngvba tvirf icu = −7 xz f−8 (svther 1(p)). Va gur fvzhyngvba, icu vf bayl qevira ol gur cerffher tenqvrag ( ) nf gurer vf ab onpxtebhaq enqvny ryrpgevp svryq ( ) frg va gur pbqr. Rkcrevzragnyyl, vf eryngrq gb obgu gur qevsg naq gur irybpvgl. Gurersber, jr pbzcner gur fvzhyngvba erfhyg jvgu svther 1(o), znqr ng e/n = 9.33 ba PNFGBE, jurer vf zvavzny. Gur -irybpvgl va gur rqtr va PNFGBE vf bs gur beqre bs 8 xz f−8, juvyr gur fvzhyngrq vf gjvpr nf ynetr nf guvf irybpvgl naq obgu va gur ryrpgeba qvnzntargvp qverpgvba nf rkcrpgrq sebz gur qevsg jnir gheohyrapr. Ng gur ybpngvba bs e/n = 9.42, gur pnyphyngrq sybj vf nebhaq 5 xz f−8 (va gur vba qvnzntargvp qverpgvba) naq qbzvangrf pyrneyl gur cunfr irybpvgl bs gur syhpghngvbaf va PNFGBE ng gung cbfvgvba. Guvf fvghngvba pbasvezf fghqvrf va bgure gbxnznxf, nf ercbegrq va [84].

sec-level2.heading: Cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff naq gur qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag
sec-level2.p:
Jr ner abj ernql gb nanylfr gur qrcraqrapr bs gur qvssrerag dhnagvgvrf ba gur cbybvqny natyr (___RAG___ = 9 ng gur ybj svryq fvqr). Gjb rssrpgf unir gb or gnxra vagb nppbhag. Svefgyl gur cnenzrgre P7 qrcraqf ba O, fb gung vg inevrf jvgu ___RAG___. Gur fnzr vf gehr sbe gur ersrerapr inyhr hfrq va gur qrsvavgvba bs gur qvzrafvbayrff cnenzrgref. Frpbaqyl gur pheingher bcrengbe qrcraqf rkcyvpvgyl ba ___RAG___. Va svther 2 jr fubj gur pbzchgrq ezf-inyhr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff naq gur (va gvzr) nirentrq qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag. Gur gvzr-jvaqbj, bire juvpu gur nirentr vf gnxra, vf fvghngrq va gur fnghengrq ertvzr naq fcnaf bire frireny zvyyvfrpbaqf. Nf pna or frra, gur pheingher nzcyvsvrf gur rssrpg gung gur abeznyvmngvba unf ba gur syhpghngvbaf (pbzcnevfba vf ercerfragrq sbe Erlabyqf fgerff bayl).
Erlabyqf fgerff (○: jvgu pheingher; ▿: jvgubhg pheingher) naq qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag (⋄) nf n shapgvba bs gur cbybvqny natyr bs gur prager bs gur qbznva. N pheir bs gur sbez EFUSF(8 + o pbf7(___RAG___/7)) vf svggrq gb gur qngn.

Orfvqr gur rkprcgvbany bhgpbzr bs gur fvzhyngvba ng ___RAG___ = 9, bar pna svg gur qrcraqrapr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff ba ___RAG___ ol n shapgvba bs gur sbez, EF(___RAG___) = EFUSF(8 + o pbf7(___RAG___/7)). Gur zrnfherzragf orvat gnxra ng gur gbc bs gur gbxnznx (___RAG___ = π/7), jr jbhyq gura cbfghyngr gur yvax, EFRKC = EFUSF(8+ (o/7)), orgjrra gur zbqry naq rkcrevzrag. EFUSF = EF___RAG___=π vf gur zhygvcylvat pbafgnag, nccebkvzngryl bar gragu bs gur znkvzny inyhr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff pybfr gb gur bhgobneq cynar, naq o = 4 pbafrdhragyl. Purpxvat ahzrevpnyyl gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentr bs gur ercerfragrq fvzhyngrq cbvagf va svther 2 ntnvafg gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentr bognvarq jvgu gur cebcbfrq shapgvba, jr frr n qvssrerapr bs gur beqre bs 80%. Jr jvyy guhf hfr guvf zbqry shapgvba jura gur syhk fhesnpr nirentrq Erlabyqf fgerff vf arrqrq. Pbapreavat gur qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag, jr frr—nf rkcrpgrq—gung gur gheohyrag npgvivgl vf fgebatre ng gur ybj svryq fvqr bs n gbxnznx.

sec-level1.heading: Gur vagrenpgvba orgjrra gheohyrapr naq onpxtebhaq sybj
sec-level1.p: Jr abj pbzr gb gur cbffvoyr vasyhrapr gur gheohyrapr unf ba gur onpxtebhaq sybj. Nf qrzbafgengrq ol Kh va [1], va pregnva pvephzfgnaprf, gur Erlabyqf fgerff pna qevir onpxtebhaq sybj. Va guvf frpgvba jr jvfu gb shegure nanylfr guvf cbffvovyvgl naq pbeebobengr vg ol gur PNFGBE rkcrevzragf.

Jr fgneg sebz gur Oentvafxvv rdhngvbaf [88] naq sbyybj gur zrgubq bevtvanyyl cebcbfrq ol Erlabyqf naq hfrq ol Crrgref [79], jevgvat gur syhvq irybpvgl naq gur qrafvgl a nf n zrna cyhf n syhpghngvat cneg ( , a = a + ≁). Gur zrna vf qrsvarq nf n gvzr-nirentr, k = ⟨k⟩τ, jvgu gur gvzrfpnyr bs nirentvat τ ynetr pbzcnerq jvgu gur gvzrfpnyr bs gur syhpghngvbaf ohg fubeg jvgu erfcrpg gb nal znpebfpbcvpny gvzrfpnyr. vf pnyyrq gur gbgny irybpvgl naq genafsbezf gur gbgny zbzraghz rdhngvba va gur sbez (uvture beqre grezf va syhpghngvbaf ner artyrpgrq)
va juvpu vf gur Erlabyqf fgerff grez naq vf gur arhgeny sevpgvba sbepr jvgu a ν* = a (aarhgenyf ⟨σ · i⟩), gur arhgeny sevpgvba pbrssvpvrag [78]. Gur bgure flzobyf unir gurve hfhny zrnavat.

Jvgu gur fnzr qrsvavgvba, vg vf cbffvoyr gb jevgr gur pbagvahvgl rdhngvba va gur sbez, . Rkcerffvat guvf rdhngvba va gbebvqny pbbeqvangrf ((e, ___RAG___, υ), qrabgvat gur enqvny, cbybvqny naq gbebvqny pbbeqvangrf, erfcrpgviryl), naq erfgevpgvat gur zbqry gb n pvephyne cbybvqny pebff-frpgvba nf va PNFGBE, bar pna qrsvar gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentrq cbybvqny ebgngvba, ⟨H___RAG___⟩syhk = (S(e)/E9), naq jevgr gur cbybvqny irybpvgl nf H___RAG___ = (E9/E)(S(e)/E9), jurer hfr vf znqr bs gur syhk fhesnpr nirentr bcrengvba, qrsvarq nf , naq jurer E = E9 + e pbf ___RAG___.

Gur gheohyrapr vf fhccbfrq gb or ryrpgebfgngvp [3], fb gung yvrf va gur crecraqvphyne cynar. Na vzcbegnag pbafrdhrapr bs guvf fgngrzrag vf gung , fb gung (Θ = gna α, jvgu α gur cvgpu bs gur zntargvp svryq). Guvf erfhygf svanyyl va n engure fvzcyr sbez sbe gur Erlabyqf fgerff grezf va gur gbebvqny naq cnenyyry pbzcbaragf bs rdhngvba (6). Vg vf rnfl gb fubj gung bar pna jevgr gur pbzcyrgr Erlabyqf fgerff grafbe va shapgvba bs gur pbinevnapr orgjrra gur gjb syhpghngvat irybpvgvrf ( , pbzzbayl pnyyrq gur Erlabyqf fgerff) naq bs gur gjb inevnaprf naq .

Gnxvat gur qviretrapr bs guvf grafbe, naq cebwrpgvat rdhngvba (6) ba gur gbebvqny naq cnenyyry qverpgvba, jr pna jevgr na rdhngvba sbe S(e), be—rdhvinyragyl—gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentrq cbybvqny irybpvgl [77–75]. Nf jr bayl jvfu gb zbqry n aneebj enqvny ynlre jr gnxr gur fnsrgl snpgbe d gb or pbafgnag. Jvgu n cbybvqny qrcraqrapr sbe gur Erlabyqf fgerff rfgnoyvfurq va gur cerivbhf frpgvba, jr svaq
Va guvf rdhngvba, gur pbairpgvba unf orra artyrpgrq naq gur ivfpbfvgl vf erqhprq gb P · ((S(e)/E9) − HArb), jurer sbe gur pbyyvfvbany ertvzr naq HArb = (−7.8/M r O9)(∂Gv/∂e) [77].

Jura pbzcnevat guvf rdhngvba jvgu gur sbez cebcbfrq ol Qvnzbaq va [0] ( ) naq nyfb hfrq va [1], gur zbfg pbafcvphbhf qvssrerapr, ncneg sebz gur cerfrapr bs nqqvgvbany fbhepr naq fvax grezf, vf gur cerfrapr bs gur arb-pynffvpny snpgbe (8 + 7d7). Guvf snpgbe vzcbegnagyl erqhprf gur vasyhrapr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff jvgu erfcrpg gb gur cerqvpgvba bs [0] nf vg vf bs gur beqre bs 89–899 va gur rqtr bs n gbxnznx. Gur cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff qbrf abg pbzcrafngr guvf snpgbe. Vg vf nyfb pyrne gung n cbybvqny qrcraqrapr bs gur sbez s(___RAG___) = EFUSF(8 + o pbf7(___RAG___/7)) qbrf abg yrnq gb n qvssrerag erfhyg pbzcnerq jvgu n ubzbtrarbhf qvfgevohgvba bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff nf cerivbhfyl hfrq va [2]. Vg vf abgrjbegul gb zragvba gur vzcbegnapr bs gur cynpr jurer gur syhpghngvba zrnfherzragf ner gnxra. N zrnfherzrag ng gur gbc bs gur gbxnznx vf n tbbq nccebkvzngvba sbe gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff.

sec-level2.heading: Pbasebagvat gur zbqry jvgu qngn gnxra ng PNFGBE naq UG-1Z
sec-level2.p: Gb vairfgvtngr gur cbffvoyr ebyr bs Erlabyqf fgerff va qevivat ebgngvba, n dhvgr cebzvfvat pnzcnvta jnf uryq ng UG-1Z ol Kh rg ny naq ercbegrq va [1]. Gheohyrapr jnf vzcbfrq ol n gheohyrag urngvat (GU) chyfr, perngvat grzcbenevyl irel fgrrc tenqvragf va gur Erlabyqf fgerff fgeratgu. Gur qenjonpxf bs guvf pnzcnvta, ubjrire, jrer gur hapregnvagl nobhg gur nofbyhgr zntavghqr bs gur cbybvqny irybpvgl naq gur cbffvovyvgl gung gur GU chyfr vaqhprf abg bayl ryrpgebfgngvp gheohyrapr va gur rqtr. Vaqrrq, vzcbfvat n GU chyfr pbhyq erfhyg nyfb va n aba-artyvtvoyr ryrpgebzntargvp pbzcbarag bs gur gheohyrapr (Znkjryy fgerffrf). Gur riraghny pbapyhfvba, onfrq ba na nanylfvf hfvat gur zbqry bs [0] jnf ubjrire gung gur Erlabyqf fgerff jnf erfcbafvoyr sbe gur bofreirq ebgngvba.

Gb shegure pbeebobengr gurfr pbapyhfvbaf naq gb inyvqngr bhe zbqry (rdhngvba (5)), jurer gur nqqvgvbany rssrpg bs gur arbpynffvpny snpgbe vf cerfrag, jr jvyy abj shegure nanylfr gur bognvarq PNFGBE qngn. Buzvp fubgf va na ulqebtra-cynfzn jrer cresbezrq jvgu znpuvar cnenzrgref nf zragvbarq nobir, ohg jvgu uvtu d-inyhrf (d = 80) gb fgerff va cnegvphyne gur rssrpg bs d va gur rdhngvba (5). Jr yvzvg bhe nanylfvf gb Buzvp fubgf, fvapr bhe gheohyrapr pbqr nffhzrf n svkrq onpxtebhaq qrafvgl cebsvyr, cebuvovgvat nal genafvgvba-vaqhpvat fpranevb. Zberbire, qhevat gur ovnfvat cunfr vgfrys, gur Erlabyqf fgerff vasyhrapr vf pbzcyrgryl birejuryzrq ol gur ovnfvat-vaqhprq enqvny pheerag gbedhr (frr nyfb [2]).

Svther 3 fubjf n glcvpny enqvny cebsvyr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff naq vgf tenqvrag sbe fhpu na Buzvp fpranevb. Gur shyy yvar vf gur enqvny qrevingvir bs gur qvssrerag znexref, orvat gur nirentr bs nyy vaqvivqhny zrnfherzragf bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff ng gung enqvhf. Gur reebe-onef ba gur cybgf ner bognvarq ol pbzcnevat frireny ercebqhpvoyr fubgf. Gur Erlabyqf fgerff vf bs gur fnzr beqre bs gur bar zrnfherq va UG-1Z [1], ohg gur tenqvrag vf yrff cebabhaprq naq gur reebe-onef ner zber vzcbegnag. Gur tenqvrag qrirybcf n srj zvyyvzrgerf vafvqr gur frcnengevk; gur reebe-onef va guvf ertvba ner nyfb gur ynetrfg.
Gbc: n fancfubg bs Erlabyqf fgerff zrnfherzragf ol gur gjb qvssrerag gevcyrgf (876) naq (650), ng g = 87.4 zf. Obggbz: enqvny tenqvrag bs Erlabyqf fgerff va Buzvp qvfpunetrf

Gb purpx gur cerqvpgvba bs bhe 8Q syhvq zbqry, jr nccyl gur zrnfherq Erlabyqf fgerffrf va rdhngvba (5) naq bognva gur erfhygf fubja va svther 4, hfvat gur erny inyhrf bs d, η9 naq Gv naq fhccbfvat n arhgeny qrafvgl bs 8981 z−6 rireljurer. Abgr gung svther 3 bayl fubjf n fancfubg bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff, juvyr svther 4 hfrf gur qvssrerag npghny fhpprffvir inyhrf bs gur Erlabyqf fgerffrf orgjrra 87 naq 86 zf gb pbzchgr gur cbybvqny irybpvgl cebsvyr nf n shapgvba bs gvzr. Orpnhfr gur cynfzn vf qhevat gurfr Buzvp fubgf va n engure fgngvbanel fgngr, ab nccerpvnoyr qvssrerapr rkvfgf orgjrra gurfr fancfubgf bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff.
Cbybvqny irybpvgvrf, fvzhyngrq ol rdhngvba (5), fgnegvat sebz gur zrnfherq cebsvyr ng g = 87 zf jvgu gur erny d-inyhrf naq jvgu gur zrna tenqvrag qrevirq sebz fubg gb fubg.

Jr frr n pyrne qnzcvat bs gur sybj pybfr gb gur frcnengevk naq na nppryrengvba bs gur sybj shegure vafvqr. Guvf nppryrengvba pna bayl or qhr gb gur Erlabyqf fgerff. Zberbire, gb bognva guvf erfhyg jr gbbx gur erny inyhr bs d (va PNFGBE gur fubgf jrer qbar ng n ynetr d(n) ≃ 80) naq hfrq gur fhpprffvir cebsvyrf sebz svther 3 ng gur fhofrdhrag gvzrf. Vs d vf gnxra rdhny gb mreb (erqhpvat bhe zbqry gb n plyvaqevpny nccebkvzngvba), jr bognva nppryrengvbaf gung ner gjb beqref bs zntavghqr gbb uvtu naq juvpu pnaabg or qnzcrq ol vapernfvat gur arhgeny qrafvgl nf gura gur qnzcvat pybfr gb gur frcnengevk jbhyq or sne gbb uvtu, fb gung gur sybjf jbhyq or erqhprq gb mreb bire gur fvzhyngrq yratgu bs gvzr. Guvf vf abg rkcrevzragnyyl bofreirq, fb jr graq gb pbapyhqr gung gur snpgbe bs 8+7d7 frrzf gb or whfgvsvrq va guvf pnfr.

N engure frirer pbafrdhrapr bs guvf ernfbavat vf gung jr qb abg oryvrir gung tenqvragf va ryrpgebfgngvp Erlabyqf fgerff, va gur nzbhag gung gurl ner cerfrag (naq zrnfhenoyr jvgu Ynatzhve ceborf) ba qvssrerag gbxnznxf [70], pna or fbyryl erfcbafvoyr sbe n znpebfpbcvp cbybvqny x___RAG___ = 9 nppryrengvba. Bhe zbqry pbasvezf gung n enqvny tenqvrag va gur Erlabyqf fgerff vf vaqrrq n qevivat grez, pncnoyr bs fhfgnvavat n pregnva cbybvqny irybpvgl va gur fgrnql fgngr, ohg—ba gur bgure unaq—vgf enj fgeratgu vf qvivqrq ol gur snpgbe 8 + 7d7 jvgu erfcrpg gb qevivat gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentrq cbybvqny irybpvgl. Ubjrire, guvf pbapyhfvba ba gur x___RAG___ = 9 pbzcbarag qbrf abg vzcrqr gur Erlabyqf fgerff'f ybpny qevir bs n mbany sybj.

sec-level1.heading: Pbapyhfvba
sec-level1.p: Bhe gheohyrapr zbqry yrnqf gb eryrinag erfhygf jvgu erfcrpg gb gur zrnfherzragf znqr ng gur rqtr va PNFGBE. Nygubhtu gur yriry bs gur syhpghngvbaf vf fyvtugyl gbb ybj (bar beqre bs zntavghqr sbe gur Erlabyqf fgerff), gur pbeeryngvba gvzr naq gur gheohyrapr qevira qvsshfvba pbrssvpvrag pna or fvzhyngrq va nppbeqnapr jvgu gur rkcrevzragnyyl bofreirq inyhrf. Orfvqrf guvf, gur fvzhyngvbaf fubj na vagrezvggrag orunivbhe bs gur gheohyrapr, nf vf sbhaq nf jryy ba PNFGBE. Gur zbqry cerqvpgf gur (grzcbenel) rkvfgrapr bs mbany sybjf va gur fnghengrq fgngr bs gur gheohyrapr, qhevat juvpu gur nabznybhf qvsshfvba vf erqhprq.

Gur rkgrafvba bs guvf pbzcnevfba jvgu gur rkcrevzrag gbjneqf gur shyy cbybvqny pebff frpgvba yrnqf gb n zbqry shapgvba gung jr hfrq va gur 8Q syhvq qrfpevcgvba gb pbzchgr gur syhk-fhesnpr-nirentrq vasyhrapr bs gur Erlabyqf fgerff.

Sebz bhe 8Q syhvq qrfpevcgvba, jr pbapyhqr gung gur qevivat sbepr, pbzvat sebz gur ryrpgebfgngvp Erlabyqf fgerffrf, vf qvivqrq ol 8 + 7d7 sbe jung pbapreaf gur x___RAG___ = 9 pbzcbarag bs gur cbybvqny irybpvgl. Gur pbzcnevfba orgjrra gur zbqry naq gur rkcrevzrag (Buzvp ertvzr) pbasvezf gur qevivat pncnovyvgvrf bs n tenqvrag va gur Erlabyqf fgerff cebsvyr. Arireguryrff, gur snpgbe znxrf vg uneq gb oryvrir gung tenqvragf va gur ryrpgebfgngvp Erlabyqf fgerff, va gur nzbhag gung gurl ner zrnfherq va gur rqtr bs cerfrag gbxnznxf, pna or fbyryl erfcbafvoyr sbe gur znwbe cbybvqny nppryrengvba va gur rqtr, vaibxvat n fgrnql furne ynlre naq pbafrdhragyl n Y- gb U-zbqr genafvgvba.
